class Solution:
    def countOfPairs(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
        maxn = 1005
        dp0 = [0] * maxn
        dp1 = [0] * maxn
        mod = 10 ** 9 + 7
        n = len(nums)
        for j in range(nums[0] + 1):
            dp0[j] = (j + 1) % mod

        # print(dp0)
        for i in range(1, n):
            for j in range(nums[i] + 1):
                idx = min(j, nums[i-1] - nums[i] + j)
                dp1[j] = dp0[idx] % mod if 0 <= idx < len(dp0) else 0
                dp1[j] += dp1[j-1] % mod if j != 0 else 0
                dp1[j] %= mod
            dp0 = dp1
            dp1 = [0] * maxn
            # print(dp0)
        return dp0[nums[-1]] % mod
